stickyBar.text: Play our debut game - School's Out! Available now!

hero.headline: Survive the School Day in School's Out!
hero.subheadline: Jump, dodge, and use Morse code in this exciting 2D arcade adventure

features.headline: A New Take on Arcade Gaming
features.subheadline: Experience the unique features that make School's Out! stand out.

items.title: Multiple Characters
items.description: Choose from student, nerd, athlete, artist, or rebel, each with unique attributes

items.title: Energy Management
items.description: Balance your energy levels as you navigate through obstacles

items.title: Morse Code Combos
items.description: Master Morse code inputs for temporary bonuses and high scores

socialProof.headline: What players are saying about School's Out!

items.quote: School's Out! is addictively fun and challenging!
The Morse code system adds a unique twist to the gameplay.
I love the different character options and their unique abilities.

items.question: What platforms is School's Out! available on?
items.answer: School's Out! is a web-based game playable on both desktop and mobile devices through your browser.

items.question: Is there a cost to play School's Out!?
items.answer: The base game is free to play. We offer optional in-game purchases for cosmetic items and boosters.

items.question: How do I learn Morse code for the game?
items.answer: Don't worry! The game includes a tutorial on Morse code, and you'll pick it up as you play.

goodBuy.headline: Ready to ace your virtual school day?
goodBuy.subheadline: Join thousands of players in the most exciting school-themed arcade game!

quote.text: School's Out! is the perfect blend of challenge and fun!
